Description:
Solid Family Home or Investment on Spacious 765sqm Block (approx.)
Investors & growing families take note! This incredibly tidy 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom abode is nestled away in a quiet court on a spacious block size of 765sqm (approx.).
Features throughout the home include:
Evaporative cooling.
Gas central heating.
Ceiling fans in all bedrooms.
Split-system heating/cooling in upstairs bedroom.
Master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in robe.
Study nook upstairs.
Built-in robes in 2 of the downstairs bedrooms.
Floating floorboards throughout.
Carpets in bedrooms.
Tiled floor in bathroom.
Decked alfresco area as you step outside the back door.
Downlights in the kitchen & the decked entertainment area.
Large fully lined studio (8.9m x 5.9m) with downlights & ceiling fan.
Single lock up garage next to the studio.
Storage shed at the rear of the property (3.4m x 3.4m).
2x water tanks.
Wonderfully located within close proximity of many amenities such as being a 30sec stroll to Northern Bay College, a short 2-minute drive to the Corio Village for all of your shopping needs, within a 3-minute drive from numerous reserves & the Corio Football Club & just a 4-minute drive to the Geelong Ring Road making travel to Melbourne & the Surf Coast simple.
Rental return of approximately $430 per week.
Insights: 5 Kerry Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Comfortable family home.
Immediately appealing and situated on a 705m2 (approx.) block, this solid brick home provides comfortable living throughout. Well located in the centre of Corio, within easy reach to a range of services and providing a lifestyle location as a key feature not to be missed.
The home itself introduces 3 bedrooms (all with BIRs), a spacious living area and bathroom. An open plan meals and kitchen area is well sized giving direct access to a large outdoor covered alfresco and inground swimming pool. Other features included ducted heating, timber flooring, gas stove top, electric oven and two outdoor garden sheds.
Prominently positioned within moments to Corio Shopping Centre, Goldsworthy Reserve, public transport, Waterworld Leisure Centre, local parks and schools and easy access to the Geelong Ring Road. Inspection is highly recommended.

Description:
Family retreat.
This superbly presented home offers all qualities of family living that you won't want to miss. Situated in a highly sought-after pocket of Corio on a generous 534m2 (approx.) block. Indulge in stylish spaces and the convenience of being so close to the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools, public transport & all major amenities.
Awash with natural light, comprising of four comfortable bedrooms, central bathroom and a delightful living/entertaining area with split system heating & cooling and a separate lounge, which can be used as the fourth bedroom. The kitchen is a highlight, blessed with plentiful bench space and a gas stove for ease of use. It overlooks a private rear yard and covered alfresco where outdoor entertaining is a breeze. Picture perfect for a modern family, this stunning home comes complete with single car garage and a garden shed for added convenience. Add this one to your inspection list today!

Immaculately Maintained and Presented
Lovingly cared for, inside you will be greeted by a spacious living/dining zone featuring light filled spaces and neutral tones. The kitchen delivers plenty of space and flows effortlessly to the dining area. The separate laundry leads out to the undercover entertaining area which is the perfect place for friend and family gatherings all year round. There are three robed bedrooms which are serviced by the updated family bathroom & separate toilet. Also on offer is a garage/workshop, split system, and well -manicured gardens to enjoy or further enhance. Close to the Corio Shopping Centre, schools, public transport and the Princes Highway for easy access to Melbourne. Your inspection will not disappoint!

Description:
Gorgeous Family Home
This spacious family home showcases a range of updates and lovely outdoor entertaining area meaning you can simply move in and start enjoying your dream lifestyle from day one. Updated on-trend flooring flows throughout the light-filled three-bedroom, two-bathroom layout which also offers dual living zones. In the heart of the home sits a great-size open plan kitchen with ample bench space, a gas cooktop, dishwasher, breakfast bar that's flows through to the dining and family zone complete with split system air-conditioning. Set at the front of the home the formal lounge room faces the street, looking out to the reserve adjacent the property and the generous master bedroom complete with walk in robe, full ensuite and split system heating and cooling. Bedrooms two and three both offer built in robes and are serviced by the central family bathroom with separate bath and shower. Set on a substantial 692sqm allotment, the property offers options for sub-division and redevelopment (stca) or you may choose to enjoy the huge backyard space on offer and huge 6x9.8-metre shed with roller doors at the front and back. For absolute convenience, Corio Village shopping centre is within walking distance along with primary and secondary schools, buses and easy access onto the Geelong Ring Road.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 10 Stirling Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Treat For The Eye On Glendye!
Situated in a quiet court here is a wonderful opportunity to secure a large family home featuring two internal living areas, a covered outdoor living area and the four well sized bedrooms that will never be outgrown. A tasteful colour palette is present throughout with quality kitchen cabinetry in good condition that will no doubt impress on inspection.
The master bedroom with ensuite is located at the front of the house - tastefully separated from the remaining three bedrooms positioned at the rear. The north facing rear yard and large covered deck/outdoor living area will be perfect for summer, entertaining family and friends.
A shed is also in the rear yard handy for storage and potential workshop area. Two covered car spots are secure behind a roller door while a carport carries across the front for quick and easy day to day access.
Gas heater wall units keep the living areas toasty during the winter months while evaporative cooling and ceiling fans accommodate the warmer summer days. With the home taking up most of the 559m2 block, here is an extensive floor plan that definitely wasn't "cheaply built" from conception. Be quick for this one!
Insights: 16 Glendye Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Own Private Oasis
This modern 4 bedroom home is a great opportunity to secure your own piece of paradise. The single level home complete with upmarket finish and tones merge beautifully with free-flowing natural light. The bedrooms are spacious, master is complimented by the ensuite, built in robe and walk in robe, the other bedrooms all have built in robes. The kitchen offers ample bench space, quality stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and adjoining meals area. The lounge room is spacious and there is a separate theatre room for family nights in. Entertaining will be effortless with the oversized alfresco area and the adjoining spa room' where up to eight people can sit comfortably in the swim spa. Set on a level block of approx. 655sqm the garden is manicured and low maintenance. There are a host of other features including, remote control double garage, garage sized shed, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar panels on roof, gutter guard, alarm system, garden shed, water tanks and privacy tinted windows. This is a home worth inspecting, you'll discover the private oasis that awaits.
Insights: 43 Browallia Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Set on a practical 678m2 block (approx) this neat 3 bedroom home is perfect for investors looking to take advantage of a savvy investment opportunity or first home buyers looking to get into the market.
Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, Electric roller shutters to the two front-facing windows, polished floorboards throughout, light and bright kitchen and meals area boasting stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, ceiling fan and plenty of bench and cupboard space, a good-sized lounge with loads of natural light, gas wall heater, ceiling fan and air conditioner, plus a neat central bathroom with shower and bath that services the home with ease.
Externally this home comes equipped with a convenient undercover pergola, gated side access, garden shed and secure low maintenance yards

3 bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans

Located in a sought after neighbourhood surrounded by multiple reserves and all major amenities within easy reach. Close by to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters, what more could you ask for?

Description:
Easy living in a sought after pocket.
This delightful home offers an exceptional opportunity in a sought after pocket of Corio that has all amenities close by including the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and local schools, making this location highly desirable with the added bonus of it being a corner block 753m2 (approx.) in the ever popular Cloverdale Estate.
Surrounded by established gardens, the interior showcases a spacious lounge which flows through to the light and bright kitchen and meals area. Comprising of three spotless bedrooms (two with BIRs) sharing the family bathroom. A very generous covered alfresco delivers yet another living space and creates a seamless exit to the private rear yard for those summer nights with family or friends. Further features include gas cooking, double car garage, gas heating & air-conditioning. Do not miss your chance to secure this remarkable property today.
Insights: 1 Hastings Way, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
A Top Position
Well located just a short walk to the Corio Central shopping centre and opposite the Northern Bay College this is an ideal family home or a sound investment property for the astute investor. Well cared for this three bedroom home offers extra features such as air-conditioning and electronic window shutters, which are great for those hot afternoons, or for shift workers. There is also a separate bungalow at the rear which doubles as another living area, or games room, plus a huge carport area and remote controlled double garage. Close to medical services, public transport and the Ring Road everything is nice and handy. Don't let this one pass you by call today to inspect.

Description:
A great way to start.
First home buyers, developers or investors take advantage of an irresistible opportunity to live in, invest or develop with the possibility of retaining front home and develop rear or start from the ground up on a wonderful 630m2 (approx.) allotment in a prime residential location (STCA).
The home itself enjoys a flexible floor plan highlighting three comfortable sized bedrooms (two with BIRs). A large yet spacious sun lit lounge with air-conditioning, meals and kitchen with plenty of cupboard space throughout. Bathroom with shower, bath, single vanity, separate toilet and laundry. Outside enjoy a huge rear yard with a two car garage and storage shed.
Desirably positioned in a convenient location, within easy access to the Princes Highway, the North Shore train station, public transport, local schools and much more. Don't miss your opportunity to secure this great home today!
Insights: 174 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy Living
If time is most important to you; whether you are busy working, having fun or enjoying travelling... you just want to live life on your terms, than look no further. This separate unit has no body corporate, is meticulously maintained and offers a huge area to entertain, store or for-fill your hobby dreams... whatever it is you do. Consisting of 2 bedrooms both with built in robes, a practical kitchen 7 years young, a functional bathroom, parquetry timber flooring, a reverse cycle split system plus gas heating and instantaneous hot water (so you never run out of hot water). With a huge wrap around verandah that has now been enclosed so you can entertain year round, also allows access from the garage to the house under cover, with the garage being remote access, life will be easy. On approximately 300 sqm allotment in walking distance to Corio Shopping Central, Schools & Bus Stops just up the road plus Ring Road access a mere few turns away, it doesn't get any more convenient. A real surprise package that will allow you to live your life, your way.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 2/145 Purnell Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Corio have recently been sold.
